document_data.mainbody:
estband was a soldier who served as a spycatcher of the Neverwinter Guard in the late 15 century DR.
He was tasked with apprehending, and specifically not killing, spies that worked against Neverwinter and its interests.
As of the , Spycatcher Westband was operating out of the Broken Crown inn located on the High Road near Cragmire Keep. He worked with passing adventurers to catch members of the Blackdagger Bandits that were operating as spies in the region and retrieve any information they carried.
